-- | A YQL engine to execute Open Data Tables
--   
@package yql
@version 0.0.0

module Data.YQL.Crypto
data Crypto
Crypto :: Crypto

module Data.YQL.Context
data Context
Context :: String -> String -> Context
contextHost :: Context -> String
contextTable :: Context -> String
host :: Lens' Context String
table :: Lens' Context String

module Data.YQL.Cache
data Cache
Cache :: Cache

module Data.YQL.Y
data Y
Y :: Cache -> Context -> Crypto -> Y
yCache :: Y -> Cache
yContext :: Y -> Context
yCrypto :: Y -> Crypto
cache :: Lens' Y Cache
context :: Lens' Y Context
crypto :: Lens' Y Crypto

module Data.YQL.Rest
data Rest
Rest :: Manager -> Request -> Rest
restHttpManager :: Rest -> Manager
restHttpRequest :: Rest -> Request
accept :: Lens' Rest (Maybe ByteString)
contentType :: Lens' Rest (Maybe ByteString)
header :: HeaderName -> Lens' Rest (Maybe ByteString)
headers :: Lens' Rest RequestHeaders
httpManager :: Lens' Rest Manager
httpRequest :: Lens' Rest Request
timeout :: Lens' Rest (Maybe Int)
url :: Lens' Rest ByteString

module Data.YQL.Response
data Response
Response :: Either Value ByteString -> Response
responseObject :: Response -> Either Value ByteString
object :: Lens' Response (Either Value ByteString)
instance Show Response

module Data.YQL.Result
data Result
Result :: Response -> ResponseHeaders -> Status -> Bool -> ByteString -> Result
resultResponse :: Result -> Response
resultHeaders :: Result -> ResponseHeaders
resultStatus :: Result -> Status
resultTimeout :: Result -> Bool
resultUrl :: Result -> ByteString
response :: Lens' Result Response
headers :: Lens' Result ResponseHeaders
status :: Lens' Result Status
timeout :: Lens' Result Bool
url :: Lens' Result ByteString

module Data.YQL
data YQL
YQL :: Response -> Rest -> Y -> YQL
yqlResponse :: YQL -> Response
yqlRest :: YQL -> Rest
yqlY :: YQL -> Y
data YQLException
YQLExceptionInternalError :: YQLException
YQLExceptionJSParseError :: ParseError -> YQLException
YQLExceptionJSRuntimeError :: String -> YQLException
YQLExceptionJSONError :: YQLException
YQLExceptionMissingInput :: YQLException
YQLExceptionMissingSelect :: YQLException
YQLExceptionTypeError :: YQLException
YQLExceptionXMLError :: YQLException
type YQLM = StateT YQL IO
rest :: Lens' YQL Rest
y :: Lens' YQL Y
instance Typeable YQLException
instance Show YQLException
instance Exception YQLException

module Language.JavaScript.Host.YQL.Inputs
inputs :: OpenDataTable -> Select -> Map String Primitive -> JavaScriptT YQLM ()

module Language.JavaScript.Host.YQL.Response
response :: JavaScriptT YQLM Object

module YQL.Rest
del :: YQLM Result
get :: YQLM Result
head :: YQLM Result
post :: ByteString -> YQLM Result
put :: ByteString -> YQLM Result

module Language.JavaScript.Host.YQL.Rest

module YQL.Y

inflate :: ByteString -> Maybe ByteString
rest :: String -> YQLM ()

module YQL.Crypto

uuid :: YQLM ByteString

yqlYTidyCallImpl :: t
yqlYXparseJsonCallImpl :: t

module Language.JavaScript.Host.YQL
yql :: OpenDataTable -> Select -> Map String Primitive -> JavaScriptT YQLM Object

module YQL.Date

module YQL
runYQL :: OpenDataTable -> Map String Primitive -> IO Value
